content: on the row below onto the left needle knit it together with the ● next row k2tog around changing to dpns or magic current stitch you could also just slip one stitch purlwise but loop as necessary if there is not an even number of it s less polished sts k3tog on the last one 18 21 23 26 29 sts ● k1b = knit 1 into the stitch below remaining ● p1b = purl 1 into the stitch below inserting right hand needle ● knit 1 row from behind ● next row k2tog around as before there should be 9 10 11 13 14 sts remaining total it s not super instructions critical though hat is worked from the brim to the top with the brim being ● cut yarn leaving a long tail ~12 for attaching a rolled back on itself and secured as you go pompom if desired pull through remaining sts several times until it s tight with a tapestry needle co 74 84 94 106 116 sts with the long tail cast on place a push needle through center hole weave in ends if bor marker join for working in the round being careful not to not attaching a pompom twist the stitches ● hint on the pompom once through the center hole split the yarn in half and tie the pom pom on with a bow with the 2 ends so it can be removed if desired license creative commons attribution-sharealike cc by-sa
